metdetection.time

Class KeySignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • metdetection.time.KeySignature

  • public class KeySignature
extends java.lang.Object
    A KeySignature stores the key signature of a song. That is, the key (represented by the number of sharps in its signature), and whether it is major or minor.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 11 Feb, 2015

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean major
      True if this key is major.
      private int numSharps
      The number of sharps in this key signature.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeySignature()
      Create a default key signature (C major).
      KeySignature(byte[] data)
      Create a new Key Signature based on the given data array.
      KeySignature(int keyNumber, boolean isMajor)
      Create a new key signature based on the given key number and major boolean.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

    • Field Detail

      • numSharps

        private final int numSharps
        The number of sharps in this key signature. Negative numbers indicate the number of flats.

      • major

        private final boolean major
        True if this key is major. False for minor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeySignature

        public KeySignature()
        Create a default key signature (C major).

      • KeySignature

        public KeySignature(byte[] data)
        Create a new Key Signature based on the given data array.
        Parameters:
        data - data[0] is numSharps. data[1] is 0 for major, 1 for minor.

      • KeySignature

        public KeySignature(int keyNumber,
            boolean isMajor)
        Create a new key signature based on the given key number and major boolean.
        Parameters:
        keyNumber - The positive offset from c to this key's tonic note.
        isMajor - major

    • Method Detail

      • getPositiveOffsetFromC

        public int getPositiveOffsetFromC()
        Get the positive offset from C of the tonic note of this key.
        Returns:
        The number of semitones between C and the next highest instance of the tonic of this key, on the range [0,11]

      • getNumSharps

        public int getNumSharps()
        Get the number of sharps in this key signature.
        Returns:
        numSharps

      • isMajor

        public boolean isMajor()
        Return whether this key is major or not.
        Returns:
        major
